Hi y'all,

Like a lot of you I have been following Cathy Woods and Ark Investments
recently. As many of you probably know, Cathy's investment strategy is based on
Wright's law, which states that for every cumulative doubling of units produced,
costs decline at a consistent rate. According to Cathy,…
